summary: filipe luis insists he wants to stay at chelsea until the end of his contract . atletico madrid considering bringing him back in the summer . luis said : ` i want to stay at the club until the end of my contract ' .
aspect: 1. Filipe Luis wants to stay at Chelsea until the end of his contract, despite Atletico Madrid's interest in re-signing him. 2. Luis struggled to secure the left back position at Chelsea. 3. Chelsea manager Jose Mourinho urges the team to continue focusing on matches and winning every game.
explain: Filipe Luis, a left back player, has stated his desire to honour his contract with Chelsea and stay there until its completion. Atletico Madrid might consider re-signing him in the summer, but Luis is prioritizing his commitment to Chelsea and their current games. Chelsea's manager, Jose Mourinho wants the team to remain focused on matches and winning each game.
